item.title: Cinnamon White Russian - Pinch of Yum

item.title: fried egg sandwich with bacon and blue cheese
item.description:
fried egg sandwich with bacon and blue cheese

Due to a delightful clerical error (a scheduled babysitter when we forgot Alex would be home from work), I got to have a weekday lunch with my husband on President's Day. In a restaurant. With linens on the table and no sippy cups in a two-table radius!
